name: @filecataloger/native-modules
description: Native modules for FileCataloger - centralized build and dependency management

scripts.build: npm run build:mouse-tracker && npm run build:drag-monitor
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:verbose: cd mouse-tracker && node-gyp rebuild --verbose && cd ../drag-monitor && node-gyp rebuild --verbose
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: cd mouse-tracker && node-gyp clean && cd ../drag-monitor && node-gyp clean
scripts.test:validate: node -e "try{require('./mouse-tracker/build/Release/mouse_tracker_darwin.node');console.log('✅ mouse-tracker loaded')}catch(e){console.error('❌ mouse-tracker failed:',e.message)}" && node -e "try{require('./drag-monitor/build/Release/drag_monitor_darwin.node');console.log('✅ drag-monitor loaded')}catch(e){console.error('❌ drag-monitor failed:',e.message)}"
